snippet: Mr. de Blasio said Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg had attacked the city’s labor unions, hampering contract negotiations. It is true that Mr. Bloomberg’s relationship with several unions has deteriorated in recent years.
abstract: Mr. de Blasio said Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg had attacked the city’s labor unions, hampering contract negotiations. It is true that Mr. Bloomberg’s relationship with several unions has deteriorated in recent years.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
